title: usernames with correct id's - more possibilities
body:
hi@all

i want to open this issue as a kind discussion-thread.
in the next weeks i would spent some time in creating a minor change in owncloud...
but before i'll spend time on this i would ask about some ideas, problems, and maybe if this update would have a realistic chance to pass the pr..

##  basic thoughts:
- this system-change must run with the normal update-function -> after the update all functions must work!
- userid, loginname, displayname
- faster db-accesses via better db-logic
- a lot a lot a lot of functions and methods must be changed
- what is with additional apps ? - these apps maybe use the old uid's as strings... but the old apps should be compatible
- maybe additonal method/var/constant in new backends to handle old apps and the new system...
- what is with hooks which use the uid? (old additional apps)

##  why all this?
more and more companies wanna give costumer their own cloud -> owncloud. but the existent user-system is not up to date...  since i learned using db's i also learned to use id's for things like usernames....   
with this minor change the db-requests would be faster and the complete user-management would give more possibilities


let the discussion begin...

@deepdiver1975 @tomneedham @lukasreschke
